alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 11:35PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mitchell and southeastern Osborne Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1135 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Luray, or 24 miles north of Russell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hunter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
